mapper.select: select c_pnum, c_qnt, cid, pname, pprice, psaleprice, pmainsfile, pstock from mw_product mw, mw_cart mc where mw.pnum = mc.c_pnum and cid = #{cid}
mapper.update: update mw_product set pstock = (select pstock-c_qnt from mw_product mp, mw_cart mc where mp.pnum = mc.c_pnum and cid = #{cid}) where pnum = (select c_pnum from mw_cart where cid=#{cid})
mapper.select: select oid, obuyer, to_char(odate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') odate, oproducts, ototal, ostatus from( select oid, obuyer, odate, oproducts, ototal, ostatus from mw_order order by odate desc)

select oid, oproducts, obuyer, ob_hp, ob_email, to_char(odate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') odate, orecipient, or_hp, or_post, or_addr1, or_addr2, ototal, opayment, oinvoice, oshipment, oship_memo, ostatus from mw_order where oid = #{oid}
mapper.insert: insert into mw_order_details(odid, od_oid, o_pnum, o_qnt) select sequ_mw_order_detail_id.nextval, mo.oid, mc.c_pnum, mc.c_qnt from mw_order mo, mw_cart mc where mc.cid = #{cid} and mo.oid = #{oid}
mapper.select: select oid from (select oid from mw_order order by odate desc) where rownum =1
select pname from mw_product where pnum=#{pnum}
select oid, o_pnum, o_qnt, pprice, psaleprice, pname, pmainsfile from mw_order mo, mw_order_details mo_d, mw_product mp where mo.oid = mo_d.od_oid and mo_d.o_pnum = mp.pnum and mo.oid = #{oid}
